interactions seem pretty obvious to us

the idea that the earth's surface

even so by the early 1960s some

before klafker and his team went to

were standing on dry land the land
hadn't moved from side to side it had
moved up we know it today as a

slowly slides beneath another in a

forces build up between these
overlapping plates and one of them slips
the result is enough energy to move an

team figured out what was going on they
